title: Friday’s best deals: iPad Air 5 pre-order discounts $60 off, M1 MacBook Air, more
content:
Heading into the weekend, all of the best Apple deals are now live with some pre-order iPad Air 5 discounts up for grabs. That’s alongside only the second M1 MacBook Air price cut of the year and these Nanoleaf Shapes Mini Triangles HomeKit lights at $80. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Friday’s best deals: iPad Air 5 pre-order discounts $60 off, M1 MacBook Air, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Going live on pre-order day, a series of iPad Air 5 discounts have landed for Apple's latest 10.9-inch iPadOS experience. Plus more.
